CONJUGATES: Noun: cells (plural) | Verb: cells (3rd singular present) | celling (present participle) | celled (past tense & past participle)
ETYMOLOGY: From Old French celle, from Latin cella 'small room, store room', related to celare 'to hide'.

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: Noun: A word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things, or to name a particular one of these.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: The smallest structural and functional unit of an organism, typically microscopic and consisting of cytoplasm and a nucleus enclosed in a membrane.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 生物体最基本的结构和功能单位，通常微观，由细胞质和细胞核组成并被细胞膜包围。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: All living organisms are composed of cells.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 所有活的生物体都由细胞构成。

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: Noun: A word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things, or to name a particular one of these.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: A small room, typically one in a prison or monastery.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 小房间，尤指监狱或修道院中的小室。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: The prisoner was confined to a narrow cell.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 犯人被关押在一个狭小的牢房里。

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: Noun: A word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things, or to name a particular one of these.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: A device that produces an electric current by converting chemical or solar energy; a battery unit.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 一种通过将化学能或太阳能转换为电能来产生电流的装置；一个电池单元。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: This flashlight uses two AA cells.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 这个手电筒使用两节AA电池。

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: Noun: A word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things, or to name a particular one of these.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: A small, usually secret, group forming a part of a larger organization.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 一个通常是秘密的、构成更大组织一部分的小团体。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: The intelligence agency uncovered a terrorist cell operating in the city.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 情报机构侦破了一个在该市活动的恐怖分子小组。

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: Noun: A word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things, or to name a particular one of these.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: A distinct unit in a larger structure, such as a spreadsheet or a mobile phone network area.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 较大结构中的一个独立单元，例如电子表格中的单元格或移动电话网络区域。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: Enter the data into cell A1 of the spreadsheet.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 将数据输入到电子表格的A1单元格中。

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: Transitive Verb: A verb that takes one or more objects.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: To confine someone in a cell.
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: They threatened to cell him if he didn't cooperate.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 他们威胁说，如果他不合作，就会把他关起来。

REGISTER: Common (for noun meanings), Rare (for verb meaning)
